content: I'm looking at implementing sharing open care gaps using this IG, http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-deqm/branches/gic-branch/gaps-examples.html. The issue I encountered is for Comprehensive Diabetes Care Measure ,https://www.ncqa.org/hedis/measures/comprehensive-diabetes-care/, there are sub-measures criteria for that. I'd like to indicate in DetectedIssue that the patient needs eye exam or blood test based on measure report. My best option is to use ServiceRequest in 'contained' to indicate it. The other option would be to reference a specific group in Measure but there is no official published Measure for Comprehensive Diabetes Care yet. Any suggestions would be appreciated.

Hi @Tun Naing , would you available to join the DEQM/Gaps in Care call tomorrow (Thursday 2pm ET) to discuss your use case? Please let me know, I will add to the agenda. The detailed meeting information can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=66929644. Also, here is the current build for the IG http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-deqm/, changes have been made to the GIC detectedIssue profile.

Thanks @Yan Heras for your response. I will definitely join the call tomorrow to describe my use case. I just reviewed the updated DetectedIssue profile but still not sure it can support the use case I am trying to address.
Great, thanks @Tun Naing! I have added this to the agenda tomorrow to discuss your use case.
